thread.title: Lady Gaga's Tiffany's Super Bowl Commerical 2017 (Video)
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga's Tiffany's Super Bowl Commerical 2017 (Video)

author: Just Jared
title: Lady Gaga's Tiffany's Super Bowl Commerical 2017 (Video)
text:
Lady Gaga ‘s commercial for Tiffany’s & Co. aired during the 2017 Super Bowl right before her appearance during the halftime show and you can watch the full video right here!
The campaign was created by former Vogue creative director Grace Coddington and features Gaga talking about empowerment and her own creative journey.
“In New York, you’re born knowing that Tiffany is the best, and that it is where the magic happens. The Brand is definitive and iconic, yet continues to push and evolve with the times,” Gaga said in a statement. “To me, Tiffany represents timeless American jewelry.”

Tiffany & Co. — Introducing Lady Gaga for Tiffany HardWear
